FuncDef:
The inof bfd enable command enables the BFD for iNOF function.
The undo inof bfd enable command disables the BFD for iNOF function. The inof bfd enable command enables the BFD for iNOF function. The undo inof bfd enable command disables the BFD for iNOF function. By default, the BFD for iNOF function is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to enable BFD in the iNOF system for fast link fault detection. In this way, the link fault information can be notified to hosts in the same iNOF zone in time, ensuring timely link switching.
